name: fav_soccer_team_matches
description: Bitbar plugin for viewing your favorite soccer team's upcoming matches and recent scores.

scripts.build: parcel build index.js --target node --bundle-node-modules --no-source-maps --out-dir ../ --out-file fav_soccer_team_matches.10m.js && npm run add-shebang && npm run chmod
scripts.debug: parcel build index.js --target node --bundle-node-modules --detailed-report --no-minify --no-source-maps --out-dir ../ --out-file fav_soccer_team_matches.10m.js && npm run add-shebang && npm run chmod

author: Taylor Sturtz
